vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.12;
son of: Elpaal (H0508);
brother of: Eber (H5677I), Shemed (H8106B), Beriah (H1283I), Shema (H8087I), Zebadiah (H2069H), Meshullam (H4918J), Hizki (H2395), Heber (H2268J), Ishmerai (H3461), Izliah (H3152) and Jobab (H3103K)
§ Misham = "purification"
a Benjamite, son of Elpaal and descendant of Shaharaim
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elpáal; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米珊 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "淨化"
一名便雅憫人, 以利巴力的兒子 (代上 8:12)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米珊 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "净化"
一名便雅悯人, 以利巴力的儿子 (代上 8:12)
